2.title: Disruptive Behavior

episode of.title: 90 Day Fiancé: Happily Ever After? (TV Series 2016– )

2.plot: Nicole awaits the results of Azan's interview. Pedro is forced to spend time with Chantel's family. Russ & Pao go to Colombia. Jorge gets the bitter taste of regret. Luis isn't stepping up as a step-dad. David's son Jacob moves in with the newlyweds.

3.title: There is Something They Don't know

episode of.title: 90 Day Fiancé: Happily Ever After? (TV Series 2016– )

3.plot:

4.title: Boiling Point

episode of.title: 90 Day Fiancé: Happily Ever After? (TV Series 2016– )

4.plot: Jorge won't change his ways for Anfisa. Russ and Juan go head to head. Nicole's parents make a final plea. Chantel's family pushes Pedro to his limit. Luis feels the wrath of Molly. David can't make both Annie and Ashley happy.

5.title: The Blame Game

episode of.title: 90 Day Fiancé: Happily Ever After? (TV Series 2016– )

5.plot: Russ and Pao's best friend Juan go head-to-head. Jorge has been keeping a secret from Anfisa. Pedro drops a bomb on Chantel. Annie's tired of David's empty promises. Luis has been distant and locks himself in a room, but Molly breaks in.

7.title: Not Off the Hook

episode of.title: 90 Day Fiancé: Happily Ever After? (TV Series 2016– )

7.plot: Annie's American Dream slips further away. Azan comes clean about why his visa was denied. Molly faces the repercussions of a K1 visa. Pao deals with the worst part of visiting family. Jorge's past haunts Anfisa. Chantel's family pushes Pedro too far.

8.title: No Turning Back

episode of.title: 90 Day Fiancé: Happily Ever After? (TV Series 2016– )

8.plot: Nicole's wedding is in jeopardy. Anfisa fears this could be Jorge's biggest lie. David and Annie hit another roadblock. Molly questions Luis's motives for marrying her. Pao gets devastating news from home. Pedro goes head to head with Chantel's family.

1.title: It's Only the Beginning

episode of.title: 90 Day Fiancé: Happily Ever After? (TV Series 2016– )

1.plot: Life after the 90 Days continues for Danielle and Mohamed, Loren and Alexei, Russ and Paola, and Melanie and Devar. The couples look back on their 90-day journey on a K1 visa and realize their lives as newlyweds have not gotten easier.

2.title: It's My Secret to Tell

episode of.title: 90 Day Fiancé: Happily Ever After? (TV Series 2016– )

2.plot: Danielle struggles with Mohamed's departure from their home. Mohamed considers moving to Miami with a woman he met online. Loren & Alexei fight over a secret Loren's hiding. Paola takes a modeling job in hopes of helping her and Russ' financial situation.

3.title: Something's Up

episode of.title: 90 Day Fiancé: Happily Ever After? (TV Series 2016– )

3.plot: Mohamed enjoys his time with Luisa and Pao plans a visit to Miami without Russ to further her modeling career.

4.title: What Don't I Know?

episode of.title: 90 Day Fiancé: Happily Ever After? (TV Series 2016– )

4.plot: Mohamed & Luisa enjoy their new life in Miami but things soon take a turn. As she focuses on a new man, Danielle wonders if she's ready to move on. Loren & Alexei travel to Israel. Paola arrives in Miami and takes things too far in her new endeavor.

5.title: The Truth Hurts

episode of.title: 90 Day Fiancé: Happily Ever After? (TV Series 2016– )

5.plot: Alexei learns his parents are not doing well, leaving him feeling torn. Mohamed & Luisa have a blow out. Danielle finally gets Mohamed's attention. Paola's new endeavor goes too far. Kyle & Noon discuss moving to Thailand.

6.title: Facing the Past

episode of.title: 90 Day Fiancé: Happily Ever After? (TV Series 2016– )

6.plot: Mohamed arrives in Ohio and finds himself at Danielle's mercy. Alexei is devastated to find that his friends in Israel have turned on him. Melanie is faced with another surprise about Devar's family. Tensions rise between Brett and his family.

7.title: Destination Impossible

episode of.title: 90 Day Fiancé: Happily Ever After? (TV Series 2016– )

7.plot: An unsure Paola struggles to face reality in Oklahoma. Danielle remains torn by her love for Mohamed, especially when he uses the power of persuasion. Kyle & Noon weigh their legal options. Loren & Alexei try to reconnect in the Holy Land.

8.title: You Can Run...

episode of.title: 90 Day Fiancé: Happily Ever After? (TV Series 2016– )

8.plot: Mohamed goes back on a promise and Danielle decides to hold him accountable. Loren opens up to Alexei's family while Paola questions her future with Russ. Brett & Daya receive upsetting news while Melanie's sister uncovers Devar's true motivations.

9.title: I Came All This Way

episode of.title: 90 Day Fiancé: Happily Ever After? (TV Series 2016– )

9.plot: Danielle makes an unwanted trip to Miami so Mohamed takes precautions. Loren & Alexei's wedding takes a turn for the worse while Russ seeks advice on his marriage to Pao. Kyle & Noon give up everything. Brett makes a romantic gesture for Daya.

10.title: The Roles Reverse

episode of.title: 90 Day Fiancé: Happily Ever After? (TV Series 2016– )

10.plot: Loren & Alexei have had a rocky trip in Israel, but will they make it down the aisle? Russ & Paola make a life-changing decision. Danielle finally takes action against Mohamed. Kyle & Noon leave everything. Mel & Devar look forward to new beginnings.

11.title: Tell All: Part 1

episode of.title: 90 Day Fiancé: Happily Ever After? (TV Series 2016– )

11.plot: The Happily Ever After couples tell all in a reunion special.

12.title: Tell All: Part 2

episode of.title: 90 Day Fiancé: Happily Ever After? (TV Series 2016– )

12.plot: The second part of the 90 Day Fiancé: Happily Ever After Tell All is filled with shocking reveals and emotional confrontations.

1.title: Happy Wife, Happy Life?

episode of.title: 90 Day Fiancé: Happily Ever After? (TV Series 2016– )

1.plot: Pao enjoys her Miami life while Russ struggles in Oklahoma. Danielle tries to move on. Mohamed starts over, but a visitor halts his progress. Jorge reveals a secret to Anfisa. Loren misses NY and her BFF. Chantel and Pedro deal with betraying her family.

2.title: When the Past Catches Up

episode of.title: 90 Day Fiancé: Happily Ever After? (TV Series 2016– )

2.plot: Anfisa flips out on Jorge for lying. Mohamed faces Danielle and her family. Pao gets a reality check in Miami while Russ has to make a choice about his marriage. Loren comes clean to Alex. Pedro must face Chantel's family.

3.title: We Got Bad Blood

episode of.title: 90 Day Fiancé: Happily Ever After? (TV Series 2016– )

3.plot: Anfisa kicks Jorge out. Loren finds out life altering news which devastates Alex. Danielle starts over with her daughters. Mohamed looks for love. Pao's past catches up with her and Russ in Miami. Chantel tests Pedro's patience and trust.

4.title: Family Secrets

episode of.title: 90 Day Fiancé: Happily Ever After? (TV Series 2016– )

4.plot: Russ and Pao struggle to get back on track. Loren and Alex deliver sad news to his mom. Chantel discovers that Pedro has been keeping secrets. Danielle sees a lawyer while pressure mounts for Mohamed. Jorge is caught between Anfisa and his sister.

5.title: Lost in Translation

episode of.title: 90 Day Fiancé: Happily Ever After? (TV Series 2016– )

5.plot: Chantel and Pedro's families get off to a rocky start in the Dominican Republic. Jorge & Anfisa rethink their relationship. Loren & Alexei receive disheartening news. Danielle and Mohamed prepare for court. Russ tries to support Pao.

6.title: Lies & Goodbyes

episode of.title: 90 Day Fiancé: Happily Ever After? (TV Series 2016– )

6.plot: Alex & Loren struggle with a big decision. Chantel & Pedro reach their breaking point. Danielle realizes a hard truth. Mohamed prepares for the trial. Jorge & Anfisa adjust to life without each other. Russ & Pao both get lucrative offers.

7.title: Models, Moms & Meltdowns

episode of.title: 90 Day Fiancé: Happily Ever After? (TV Series 2016– )

7.plot: Chantel & Pedro's situation worsens. Anfisa reveals a shocking secret. Jorge hopes a grand gesture will win Anfisa back. Russ and Pao are at odds once again. Mohamed learns what Danielle has been up to. Danielle fears the worst in court.

8.title: I Do's and Don'ts

episode of.title: 90 Day Fiancé: Happily Ever After? (TV Series 2016– )

8.plot: Chantel's relationship with Pedro's family worsens. Loren gets a huge surprise. Pao makes a decision that jeopardizes her marriage to Russ. Danielle and Mohamed prepare for court.

9.title: Where Do We Go From Here?

episode of.title: 90 Day Fiancé: Happily Ever After? (TV Series 2016– )

9.plot: Chantel and Pedro prepare to walk down the aisle. Russ and Pao are at a crossroads. Danielle and Mohamed finally face-off. Anfisa and Jorge meet up to discuss the future of their relationship.

10.title: Tell All: Part 1

episode of.title: 90 Day Fiancé: Happily Ever After? (TV Series 2016– )

10.plot: In the first part of this three-hour Tell All special, the couples of 90 Day Fiancé: Happily Ever After? come together in New York City. They're hashing out their hardest moments from this past season and nothing is off limits.

11.title: Tell All: Part 2

episode of.title: 90 Day Fiancé: Happily Ever After? (TV Series 2016– )

11.plot: The second part of the 90 Day Fiancé: Happily Ever After Tell All is filled with shocking reveals and emotional confrontations.

12.title: Tell All: Part 3

episode of.title: 90 Day Fiancé: Happily Ever After? (TV Series 2016– )

12.plot: In the final part of this three-hour 90 Day Fiance: Happily Ever After Tell All special, Jorge and Anfisa are finally pressed for the truth and Mohamed goes off the grid.

imdb.plot outline: Life after 90 Days continues for Danielle & Mohamed, Loren & Alexei, Russ & Paola, Jorge & Anfisa and Chantel & Pedro as they each have a quick dose of reality and drama unfolds when married life in America doesn't quite live up to their expectations.
